vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.28;
son of: Onam (H0208H);
brother of: Shammai (H8060);
father of: Jether (H3500I) and Jonathan (H3129)
§ Jada = "He knows"
a Judahite, son of Onam and brother of Shammai, in the genealogy of the sons of Jerahmeel by his wife Atarah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅大 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他知道"
一名猶大人, 阿南的兒子, 也是沙買的兄弟, 在族譜裡
屬耶拉蔑與妻子亞他拉的後代
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅大 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "他知道"
一名犹大人, 阿南的儿子, 也是沙买的兄弟, 在族谱里
属耶拉蔑与妻子亚他拉的后代
